column1: Antibodies used are against AJ proteins and include E - cadherin ( E - cad), the transmembrane core protein; beta - catenin ( beta - cat), which binds E - cadherin at AJs and which can also participate as a transcription cofactor when associated with LEF - 1 / TCF proteins in the nucleus; alpha - catenin ( alpha - cat) which binds to both beta - catenin and Ajuba, a close relative of zyxin; and Ajuba, which can associate with proteins that bind to the actin cytoskeleton, as well as with Grb - 2, a mediator of the GTP nucleotide - exchange protein Sos, involved in activation of the Ras - MAPK signaling cascade.

column1: The sequences of the primers used for genotyping PCR were: Pygo2 null allele, forward ( F) CCTGGATTCTTGTTGCTGGTATG; reverse ( R) AAGGTATTTGGTGCTCCGAGGG; Pygo2 WT or floxed allele, F TGTCTTGATGACAGCGTTTAGCC, R AGATTCAGTAAGCTGAGCCTGGTG; Pygo1 null allele, F AGTTTGAAATAGCGACGAGTTTGAG, R 5 ' - CACTTCTGCCCCTCTCTTTGC; Pygo1 WT or floxed allele, F AAGCGTGCCTCATCTCCATCCCTAAG, R GCCCTCCCCGACGTTTATATTG.
